classes.label: UWorldSubsystem
classes.desc: Base class for auto instanced and initialized systems that share the lifetime of a UWorld

classes.label: UGameInstanceSubsystem
classes.desc: Base class for auto instanced and initialized systems that share the lifetime of the game instance

classes.label: UEngineSubsystem
classes.desc: Base class for auto instanced and initialized systems that share the lifetime of the Engine

classes.label: UEditorSubsystem
classes.desc: Base class for auto instanced and initialized systems that share the lifetime of the Editor

classes.label: ULocalPlayerSubsystem
classes.desc: Base class for auto instanced and initialized subsystem that share the lifetime of local players

classes.label: UCharacterMovementComponent
classes.desc: The character movement component is an Actor Component that provides an encapsulated movement system with common modes of movement for humanoid characters, including walking, falling, swimming, and flying
